title: Kendra's Dark Desires
description: Kevin had always been fond of Kendra, but when he showed up unexpectedly and found her in the midst of a kinky bondage game with her date his view took on a radical change. More importantly, her view of him changed even more. Now that he knew, she began to tease and taunt him, daring him to dominate her. It was a dare he couldn't long resist, her desire for submission, for discipline, seemed endless, and she begged him to take her to her limits, and past them, to her dark fantasies where she was little more than a sex slave for him and his Graphic sex and sexuality
author: J.J. Argus
